about_the_game:
Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is a refreshing new tower defense experience.





Placeable & Upgradable Towers



Upgradeable Player Stats



Single player campaign and arcade mode
4 player local co-op and remote play in both campaign and arcade
Full support for PS4, PS5, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and more controllers
25 playable levels
4 playable characters, with unlockable costumes, additional playable characters, features and more
Your character’s speed, power & more can be upgraded during a match and are reset afterwards
The game speed and enemy counts can be multiplied to add challenge and boost your score



The Paper Kingdom of Cyperus is a peaceful, prosperous land with many happy citizens. King Berghor, together with Queen Wendy, have ruled justly and fairly for as long as they have reigned. No one wants for anything until a certain lord catches wind of something unsavory happening in the lands...

The evil Lord Vilmos has discovered statues erected in the kingdom bearing his likeness. He finds these art pieces made in his image to be very unflattering.

His aim is to send his minions to these statues scattered throughout the kingdom and turn them to rubble.

King Berghor, ruler of Cyperus, fears this backlash, and comissions 4 great warriors to defend the priceless artwork.

Put an end to Vilmos' schemes! Travel through 25 levels in a sketchbook come to life in this tower defense game. Take control of your character and upgrade your towers. Play solo or up to 4-player in local co-op. Earn in-game currency to unlock new characters, costumes, gallery items and more! Increase the speed multiplier as well as the enemy count multiplier to hit new high scores.



We at Big Mitten Games plan to support Blitz in the Paper Kingdom for a long time with free updates. We hope to add new playable characters, levels, features and other things. Community feedback is important to us, and if YOU have ideas on how to make our game great don't hesistate to let us know!

short_description: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is an indie tower defense game, set in a pop-up sketch book. Players can place automated towers while controlling a character to defeat enemies and defend the king's statues.
